title: Gospel Music Explosion 2016
desc: We are poised to venture into an exciting gospel musical event that will take place in 2016. Arriving at a formal Black Tie Affair, are the Gospel Sounds of Inspiration, a musical group and world renowned motivational speaker.? "It's Time to Put on Your Sunday Best for a Gospel Fest!" Presented to revive a spirit's will to survive, rescue souls who suffer silently, enjoy the elation of thunderous praise; this soulful musical event is set to celebrate the New Year as a shining season of favor in good faith.? With over 200 attendees entertained by emerging and established talents, this weekend event will also include incredible workshops and a law enforcement forum.? Raffle tickets will be sold throughout the weekend in anticipation of grand give-a-away's.? Gospel classics such as "His Eye is on the Sparrow", "Nearer My God to Thee," and "Oh Mary Don't You Weep" and many more will be performed by live instrumentalists, seasoned musicians, and sung by powerfully victorious voices dedicated to soul-stirring praise and worship.? Our singers will take you on a fantastical journey through different era's of music.? You will also enjoy a delicious dinner the night of the performance.? Come and listen to the sounds of great gospel music.
